content:
{
  "package_id": "infra-phase5",
  "specialist": "deployment-orchestrator",
  "token_count": 2156,
  "priority": "critical",
  "coordination_metadata": {
    "parallel_safe": false,
    "dependencies": ["file-organization"],
    "estimated_duration": "30 minutes",
    "rollback_capable": true
  },
  "mission": {
    "objective": "Ensure Docker infrastructure remains stable during reorganization",
    "approach": "path-preservation",
    "validation": "continuous health monitoring"
  },
  "docker_compose_analysis": {
    "critical_paths": [
      "./app/*/Dockerfile",
      "./app/*/requirements.txt",
      "./config/**/*.yaml",
      "./shared:/app/shared"
    ],
    "services_count": 15,
    "volume_mounts": 23,
    "network_configs": 3
  },
  "path_dependencies": {
    "must_preserve": [
      "app/coordination_service/",
      "app/memory_service/",
      "app/reasoning_service/",
      "app/learning_service/",
      "app/worker/",
      "app/webui-next/",
      "shared/"
    ],
    "can_reorganize": [
      "scripts/",
      "tests/",
      "docs/",
      "data/"
    ]
  },
  "monitoring_strategy": {
    "health_endpoints": [
      "http://localhost:8000/health",
      "http://localhost:3000/api/health",
      "http://localhost:6333/health"
    ],
    "validation_interval": "5 seconds",
    "failure_threshold": 3,
    "recovery_action": "automatic rollback"
  },
  "deployment_validation": {
    "pre_deployment": [
      "docker-compose config",
      "docker network ls",
      "docker volume ls"
    ],
    "post_deployment": [
      "docker-compose ps",
      "service health checks",
      "integration tests"
    ]
  },
  "rollback_procedures": {
    "triggers": [
      "service startup failure",
      "health check failure",
      "import error detection"
    ],
    "steps": [
      "docker-compose down",
      "git reset --hard HEAD",
      "docker-compose up -d",
      "verify all services healthy"
    ]
  },
  "success_criteria": {
    "all_services_running": true,
    "health_checks_passing": true,
    "no_path_errors": true,
    "volumes_intact": true,
    "networks_operational": true
  }
}
